name: Mosaic Hearts Preview Chapter 00 - 01
description:
This is a pre-alpha game. Things may be subject to change in the future.


Jonn visits his hometown to find that it’s been swept up in a Territory War.  The person with the most territories in two weeks is granted one wish by the richest woman in the world, Noel Weisburg. 

Mosaic Hearts is an Action Adventure RPG where you can recruit EVERY SINGLE ENEMY!

Fast paced action  and challenging boss fights!

Make seamless combos with different weapons!

Explore a small town full of unique & quirky characters!
